title: [威士忌] Kavalan Solist Ex-Bourbon Cask
content:
https://i.imgur.com/N2GdcIv.jpg
Kavalan is the very first distillery from Taiwan. Located at I-lan, which also called “Kavalan” in the past, they produce their whiskies with extra-fine water from Snow Mountain. According to the unique tropical weather in Taiwan, the aging process was accelerated as triple-speed compared to Scotland. As for the newmake, fresh mango, pineapple, peach and plums give Kavalan’s spirits different from any other distilleries all over the world. 
This ex-Bourbon cask Solist was awarded as double trophy in 2016 ISC (International SpiritsChallange). Double trophy means the winner of all winners in bourbon fashion, means this one is the best bourbon whisky in 2016. Every distillery produce bourbon whiskies, but this Kavalan Solist out-standing all those competitors. Proud of Taiwan, either proud of being a Taiwanese. 
.
57.8% abv, cask strength, non Chill-filtered, natural color
Batch no. 090A, 2014/12/17 distilled
.
Color: pre-autumn maple gold
Nosing: cocoa, heavy cream, salted butter, harmonic and balanced aroma, green tea shows up after diluted with distill water, 
Palating: silky smooth, excellent impression of all Bourbon whiskies, soft and light body like autumn breeze, cream-buttered cocoa with light salted cream brûlée, caramelized brown sugar and well sweetened green tea
Aftertaste: long, accompanied with green tea and relaxing harmony, no bitterness, no dryness, nothing unpleasant flavour, just PERFECT
為什麼
一定要
十五個
